description:
As a QA engineer
  I want to test HWPC API endpoints
  So that I can verify the API functionality works correctly

elements.name: User can check HWPC API health

steps.name: user has access to HWPC API
user checks HWPC API health

embeddings.data: Request:  curl 'http://10.147.17.219:3000/api/v1/health' -X GET -H "content-type: application/json" -H "accept: application/json"

steps.name: user should get a successful response with status code 200
user should get HWPC API success response
user should get HWPC API response with data

elements.name: User gets error when retrieving non-existent ticket

steps.name: user has access to HWPC API
user makes a request to retrieve HWPC ticket with ID "550e8400-e29b-41d4-a716-999999999999"

embeddings.data: Request:  curl 'http://10.147.17.219:3000/api/v1/tickets/550e8400-e29b-41d4-a716-999999999999' -X GET -H "content-type: application/json" -H "accept: application/json"

steps.name: user should get an error response with status code 404
user should get HWPC API error with code "NOT_FOUND"
user should get HWPC API error message containing "not found"

elements.name: User gets validation error when creating ticket with missing data

steps.name: user has access to HWPC API
user creates a new HWPC ticket with title "", description "Missing title", and priority "invalid_priority"

embeddings.data:
Request:  curl 'http://10.147.17.219:3000/api/v1/tickets' -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "accept: application/json" --data-binary '{
  "title": "",
  "description": "Missing title",
  "priority": "invalid_priority",
  "status": "open",
  "category": "general",
  "customerId": "64fcec34-150a-476f-804a-3e9072a7e6bf"
}'

steps.name: user should get an error response with status code 400
user should get HWPC API error with code "VALIDATION_FAILED"
user should get validation error for field "title"
user should get validation error for field "priority"
